topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c1ca3063687230b6a60200#post_54c1ca3063687230b6a60200
Most people don't buy the entire series. That would be a very daunting task. Usually they just get trade paperbacks of certain storylines or whatever new issue is out...unless the series sucks.

Plus most good writers will explain the backstory of the comic for new readers.

Outside of superhero's though, most comics are relatively short.
